page.title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Cheat Command Generator

preparation.open_console: The default key for opening the console is

copy_message: Command has been copied to the clipboard

open_console.title: Open Console
open_console.description: Default shortcut key to open the console interface.

enable_cheat.title: Enable Cheat
enable_cheat.description: Enable cheat mode in the console without restarting the game.

disable_cheat.title: Disable Cheat
disable_cheat.description: Disable cheat mode in the console without restarting the game.

map_teleport.title: Map Teleport
map_teleport.description: Hold CTRL while left-clicking on the map to teleport to any location.
map_teleport.generated_command: Hold CTRL while left-clicking on the map to teleport to any location.

show_on_map_troops.title: Show All Troops on Map
show_on_map_troops.description: Show all troops on the map, provided that you have seen the troop for the first time; otherwise, it will not be displayed correctly. Set 1 to 0 to turn off the display of all troops on the map.

heal_self.title: Heal Self
heal_self.description: In battle, heal yourself to 100% health.

heal_horse.title: Heal Horse
heal_horse.description: In battle, heal your horse to full health.

knock_down_one_enemy.title: Knock Down One Enemy
knock_down_one_enemy.description: Knock down one enemy on the battlefield.

knock_down_all_enemies.title: Knock Down All Enemies
knock_down_all_enemies.description: Knock down all enemies on the battlefield.

knock_down_one_ally.title: Knock Down One Ally
knock_down_one_ally.description: Knock down one of your soldiers on the battlefield.

knock_down_all_allies.title: Knock Down All Allies
knock_down_all_allies.description: Knock down all your soldiers on the battlefield.

knock_down_self.title: Knock Down Self
knock_down_self.description: Knock yourself down on the battlefield.

add_gold_skill_points_relationships.title: Commands to Add Gold, Skill Points, Relationships, etc.

add_gold.title: Add Gold
add_gold.description: Add a specified amount of gold to the specified hero.

add_gold_for_everyone.title: Add Gold for Everyone
add_gold_for_everyone.description: Add a specified amount of gold to all heroes.

increase_influence.title: Increase Influence
increase_influence.description: Increase the main character's influence by a specified amount.

increase_renown.title: Increase Renown
increase_renown.description: Increase the specified clan's renown by a specified amount.

parameters.clan_name: Clan name (leave empty for your own clan)

increase_focus_points.title: Increase Focus Points
increase_focus_points.description: Add a specified number of focus points to the specified hero.

increase_attribute_points.title: Increase Attribute Points
increase_attribute_points.description: Add a specified number of attribute points to the specified hero.

add_troops_xp.title: Add Troops XP
add_troops_xp.description: Add a specified amount of experience points to the main troop (does not affect hero units).

increase_hero_relation.title: Increase Hero Relationship
increase_hero_relation.description: Increase the main character's relationship with the specified hero.

increase_all_heroes_relation.title: Increase All Heroes' Relationship
increase_all_heroes_relation.description: Increase the main character's relationship with all heroes.

increase_two_handed_xp.title: Increase Two-Handed Skill XP
increase_two_handed_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Two-Handed skill.

increase_one_handed_xp.title: Increase One-Handed Skill XP
increase_one_handed_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's One-Handed skill.

increase_athletics_xp.title: Increase Athletics Skill XP
increase_athletics_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Athletics skill.

increase_throwing_xp.title: Increase Throwing Skill XP
increase_throwing_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Throwing skill.

increase_riding_xp.title: Increase Riding Skill XP
increase_riding_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Riding skill.

increase_bow_xp.title: Increase Bow Skill XP
increase_bow_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Bow skill.

increase_polearm_xp.title: Increase Polearm Skill XP
increase_polearm_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Polearm skill.

increase_crossbow_xp.title: Increase Crossbow Skill XP
increase_crossbow_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Crossbow skill.

increase_smithing_xp.title: Increase Smithing Skill XP
increase_smithing_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Smithing skill.

increase_roguery_xp.title: Increase Roguery Skill XP
increase_roguery_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Roguery skill.

increase_tactics_xp.title: Increase Tactics Skill XP
increase_tactics_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Tactics skill.

increase_scouting_xp.title: Increase Scouting Skill XP
increase_scouting_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Scouting skill.

increase_charm_xp.title: Increase Charm Skill XP
increase_charm_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Charm skill.

increase_leadership_xp.title: Increase Leadership Skill XP
increase_leadership_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Leadership skill.

increase_trade_xp.title: Increase Trade Skill XP
increase_trade_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Trade skill.

increase_steward_xp.title: Increase Steward Skill XP
increase_steward_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Steward skill.

increase_medicine_xp.title: Increase Medicine Skill XP
increase_medicine_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Medicine skill.

increase_engineering_xp.title: Increase Engineering Skill XP
increase_engineering_xp.description: Add experience points to the specified hero's Engineering skill.

give_all_crafting_materials.title: Give All Crafting Materials to Main Party
give_all_crafting_materials.description: Give the main party a specified amount of all crafting materials.

add_troops.title: Add Troops
add_troops.description: Add specified troops to your party.

parameters.party_name: Party name (leave empty for main party)

add_companion.title: Add Companion
add_companion.description: Add a random companion to your party.

add_companions.title: Add Companions
add_companions.description: Add a specified number of companions to your party.

activate_all_policies.title: Activate All Policies
activate_all_policies.description: Activate all policies for the player's kingdom.

give_all_settlements.title: Give All Settlements and Fortresses to Player
give_all_settlements.description: Give all settlements and fortresses to the player.

add_caravan_to_hero.title: Add Caravan to Hero
add_caravan_to_hero.description: Add a caravan to the specified hero.

add_companion_followers.title: Add Companion
add_companion_followers.description: Add a follower to your party.

add_horse_to_hero.title: Add Horse to Hero
add_horse_to_hero.description: Add a horse to the specified hero.

increase_party_morale.title: Increase Party Morale
increase_party_morale.description: Increase the morale of the main party.

add_prisoner.title: Add Prisoner
add_prisoner.description: Add a prisoner to your party.

add_building_progress.title: Add Building Progress
add_building_progress.description: Increase the construction progress of the current building.

add_random_hero_to_party.title: Add Random Hero to Party
add_random_hero_to_party.description: Add a random hero to your party.

add_random_prisoner_hero.title: Add Random Prisoner Hero
add_random_prisoner_hero.description: Add a random prisoner hero to your party.

add_sample_children_to_main_character.title: Add Sample Children to Main Character
add_sample_children_to_main_character.description: Add sample children to the specified hero.

create_player_kingdom.title: Create Player Kingdom
create_player_kingdom.description: Immediately create a kingdom for yourself.

make_peace_with_every_faction.title: Make Peace with Every Faction
make_peace_with_every_faction.description: Make peace with all factions and clear your criminal record.
